channel.title: [PI] Barrows Glitch

item.title: [PI] Barrows Glitch
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It’s not your coords. It’s your map data you have in your cache.
You’re missing (or have corrupt) data for those 3 tombs.
I’d look for new 508 maps or something, to replace that section you are missing.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Barrows Glitch
item.dc:creator: @bruster11 bruster11
item.description:
@bruster11 wrote:

I seem to be having a problem with my barrows. Whenever I dig at the Ahrims, Guthans, or Karils tomb it takes me to a black space. The coords are correct though. Because when I dig in lets say dharoks tomb it takes me to his correct tomb. I will then tele to Ahrims tomb using the coords from PlayerAssist.java and it will load fine. So what is the problem?

This is the PlayerAssistant.java

public void changeLocation() {
switch(c.newLocation) {
case 1:
movePlayer(3578, 9706, -1); //Verac’s crypt
break;
case 2:
movePlayer(3568, 9683, -1); //Torag’s crypt
break;
case 3:
movePlayer(3557, 9703, -1); //Ahrim’s crypt
break;
case 4:
movePlayer(3556, 9718, -1); //Dharok’s crypt
break;
case 5:
movePlayer(3534, 9704, -1); //Guthan’s crypt
break;
case 6:
movePlayer(3546, 9684, -1); //Karil’s crypt
break;
}
c.newLocation = 0;
}

Read full topic
